column1: Why is this research being done?

The Open Source landscape has changed a lot during the last decade. Existing literature about motivation to contribute dates from the early 2000s and does not cover the potential changes that the involvement of companies and foundations brought. Our aim to understand what is currently motivating contributors in Open Source projects. By investigating this new scenario
column2: we will help companies and communities to understand how to bring and retain newcomers
column3: creating more sustainable communities.
